title: 4-Day Boutique Bora Bora Cruise
description: Set sail on a four-day cruise of Tahiti aboard a boutique vessel with just 12 cabins for a truly exclusive experience. Explore the sparkling lagoons, pearl farms, vanilla plantations and champagne sand beaches of Bora Bora and beyond with all your meals, complimentary wines with lunch and dinner, all non-alcoholic beverages, complimentary kayaking, snorkelling and paddle boarding, and a shore excursion included.

vendor_name: InterContinental Bora Bora Resort & Thalasso Spa
title: Bora Bora Beachfront Oasis with Overwater Villas
description: Claiming prime real estate on Bora Bora’s sun-soaked Motu Piti Aau, the InterContinental Bora Bora Resort & Thalasso Spa, an IHG Hotel, couldn’t be better placed. Spectacular in size and beauty, this hotel has it all with eight exquisite dining venues, bars and lounges, two swimming pools and the rejuvenating Deep Ocean Spa. An endless stretch of private golden sand also offers a playground for experiences and recreation, including watersports and walks.
location_description: InterContinental Bora Bora Resort & Thalasso Spa, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Motu Piti Aau, Bora Bora, 98730, French Polynesia/Tahiti

title: Exquisite Bora Bora Escape near Matira Beach
description: Discover authentic Polynesian hospitality in the gorgeous InterContinental Bora Bora Le Moana Resort, an IHG Hotel, surrounded by waving palm trees and clear turquoise waters. Spend your days exploring famous dive sites around the island, hunt for the world-famous Tahitian black pearls, or wander around Matira Beach. When you need quality time to yourself, admire paradise from your bungalow's terrace, or enjoy an exquisite meal from one of the resort's beachfront restaurants.
location_description: InterContinental Bora Bora Le Moana Resort, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Matira Point, Bp 156 Vaitape, Bora Bora, 98730, French Polynesia/Tahiti
